org.openqa.selenium.remote.http

类 AbstractHttpCommandCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.remote.http.AbstractHttpCommandCodec
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CommandCodec<HttpRequest>
    直接已知子类:
    JsonHttpCommandCodec, W3CHttpCommandCodec

    public abstract class AbstractHttpCommandCodec
extends Object
implements CommandCodec<HttpRequest>
    A command codec that adheres to the W3C's WebDriver wire protocol.
    另请参阅:
    W3C WebDriver spec

        public HttpRequest encode(Command command)
        从接口复制的说明: CommandCodec
        Encodes a command.

      • decode

        public Command decode(HttpRequest encodedCommand)
        从接口复制的说明: CommandCodec
        Decodes a command.
        指定者:
        decode 在接口中 CommandCodec<HttpRequest>
        参数:

        返回:
        the decoded command.

      • defineCommand

        public void defineCommand(String name,
                          HttpMethod method,
                          String pathPattern)
        Defines a new command mapping.
        指定者:
        defineCommand 在接口中 CommandCodec<HttpRequest>
        参数:
        name - The command name.
        method - The HTTP method to use for the command.
        pathPattern - The URI path pattern for the command. When encoding a command, each path segment prefixed with a ":" will be replaced with the corresponding parameter from the encoded command.

      • alias

        public void alias(String commandName,
                  String isAnAliasFor)
        从接口复制的说明: CommandCodec
        Allow commands to have aliases.
        指定者:
        alias 在接口中 CommandCodec<HttpRequest>
        参数:
        commandName - The command being added.
        isAnAliasFor - The command name that this is an alias for.
